alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 10:52PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Dawson County through 1130 PM CDT... At 1052 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brady, or 21 miles southeast of North Platte, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of western Dawson County, including the following locations... Farnam. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 209 and 222. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
